topic.title: Allergies and Intolerances Section (entries optional) (V3) - conformance rules

section.p: Known Subclasses: Allergies and Intolerances Section (entries required) (V3)

This section lists and describes any medication allergies, adverse reactions, idiosyncratic reactions, anaphylaxis/anaphylactoid reactions to food items, and metabolic variations or adverse reactions/allergies to other substances (such as latex, iodine, tape adhesives). At a minimum, it should list currently active and any relevant historical allergies and adverse reactions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7800, CONF:1198-10378, CONF:1198-32544 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Allergies Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15345)/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15346, CONF:1198-32139)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7804, CONF:1198-15444)
Conforms to Allergy Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Allergies Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15345)/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15346, CONF:1198-32139)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7802, R2.1=CONF:1198-7802)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7803, R2.1=CONF:1198-7803)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7804, CONF:1198-15444)
Conforms to Allergy Concern Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30:2015-08-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7800, CONF:10378 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6"

Consol Allergies Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15345)/@code="48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15346)
Consol Allergies Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7802, R2.1=CONF:1198-7802)
Consol Allergies Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7803, R2.1=CONF:1198-7803)

Consol Allergies Section Entries Optional If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7804, CONF:7805) Conforms to Allergy Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.30)
